Class ClanChief

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.ClanChief
public class ClanChief extends Character
Represents a clan chief who leads a place and manages its inhabitants. A clan chief can examine their place, create new characters, heal and feed characters, manage magic potion distribution, and transfer characters between locations.

      Creates a new character in this chief's place.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the character was successfully added, false otherwise

    • healCharactersInPlace

      public void healCharactersInPlace()
      Heals all characters in the chief's place. Delegates to the place's healing method.

    • feedCharactersInPlace

      public void feedCharactersInPlace()
      Feeds all characters in the chief's place.

    • askDruidToBrewPotion

      public boolean askDruidToBrewPotion(Character druid, Pot pot, List<Ingredient> ingredients)
      Asks a druid to brew a magic potion. The druid must be present in the place and must be of type DRUID.
      Parameters:
      druid - the druid who will brew the potion
      pot - the pot to fill with potion
      ingredients - the ingredients to use
      Returns:
      true if the potion was successfully brewed, false otherwise

    • givePotionToCharacter

      public boolean givePotionToCharacter(Character character, Pot pot)
      Makes a character from this place drink a dose of magic potion.
      Parameters:
      character - the character who will drink
      pot - the pot containing the potion
      Returns:
      true if the character successfully drank, false otherwise

    • transferCharacter

      public boolean transferCharacter(Character character, Place destinationPlace)
      Transfers a character from this place to a battlefield or enclosure.
      Parameters:
      character - the character to transfer
      destinationPlace - the destination place candidate
      Returns:
      true if transfer was successful, false otherwise
